skill.name: dependency-management
skill.description: Dependency management specialist. Use when updating dependencies, scanning for vulnerabilities, analyzing dependency trees, or ensuring license compliance. Handles npm, pip, maven, and other package managers.
skill.summary: Dependency management specialist. Use when updating dependencies, scanning for vulnerabilities, anal...
skill.author: Joseph OBrien

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with minimal Python helper script for parsing dependency files. The script only reads files explicitly passed as command-line arguments and outputs parsed JSON. No network calls, no data exfiltration, and behavior matches stated purpose.

content.value_statement: Managing project dependencies manually is time-consuming and risky. Outdated dependencies create security vulnerabilities. This skill automates dependency analysis, vulnerability scanning, and license compliance checks across multiple package managers.
actual_capabilities: Parses dependency files from npm, pip, Poetry, and Maven
Scans for security vulnerabilities using package manager tools
Checks license compatibility for all dependencies
Identifies outdated packages and version conflicts
limitations: Does not execute updates without user confirmation
Does not access private package registries
Requires external tools for full vulnerability scanning

use_cases.title: Security vulnerability scan
use_cases.description: Scan Node.js or Python projects for known vulnerabilities and receive fix recommendations.

use_cases.title: License compliance check
use_cases.description: Verify all dependencies have compatible licenses before releasing to production.

use_cases.title: Dependency health audit
use_cases.description: Generate comprehensive reports on dependency age, duplicates, and maintenance status.

prompt_templates.title: Scan for vulnerabilities
prompt_templates.prompt: Scan my dependencies for security vulnerabilities and show me which packages need updates.

prompt_templates.title: Check outdated packages
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me all outdated dependencies in my project with their current and latest versions.

prompt_templates.title: License review
prompt_templates.prompt: Check license compatibility for all dependencies in my project and flag any issues.

prompt_templates.title: Generate audit report
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a complete dependency audit including vulnerabilities, outdated packages, license compliance, and recommendations.

output_examples.input: Scan my dependencies for security vulnerabilities
output: Critical: lodash@4.17.20 - CVE-2021-23337 (Prototype Pollution) - Fix: Update to 4.17.21
High: express@4.16.4 - CVE-2022-24999 (Path Traversal) - Fix: Update to 4.18.2
Medium: axios@0.21.0 - CVE-2023-45857 (SSRF) - Fix: Update to 1.6.0
Run 'npm update lodash express axios' to apply fixes

best_practices: Review changelogs before applying major dependency updates
Test your project after updating dependencies
Use lock files to ensure reproducible dependency versions
anti_patterns: Blindly updating all dependencies without reviewing changes
Ignoring medium and low severity vulnerability warnings
Using floating version ranges for critical dependencies

faq.question: Which package managers are supported?
faq.answer: Supports npm, pip, Poetry, Maven, Gradle, and Cargo with additional reference guides.

faq.question: What are the limits on dependency count?
faq.answer: No hard limits. Processing time scales with project size. Very large projects may take longer.

faq.question: How does it integrate with my existing tools?
faq.answer: Uses native package manager commands like npm audit and pip-audit for security scanning.

faq.question: Is my project data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill only reads dependency files you specify. No data is sent to external servers.

faq.question: Why did the scan fail?
faq.answer: Common issues include missing lock files, invalid dependency syntax, or unavailable package manager tools.

faq.question: How is this different from Dependabot?
faq.answer: This skill provides interactive analysis and recommendations. Dependabot automates pull requests for updates.
